title: 60. Don't Be Hard on Yourself in Your Self Love Journey
description:
Hey girl!
 
In this episode, we talk about what it looks like when we criticize how we heal, how fast we heal, and what our progress looks like. We talk about why we need to be more gentle on ourselves and why self-love has its ups and downs and why that's normal. Can't wait to catch you on the other side!
 
Click here to join the no more codependent thought patterns masterclass!
 
(or visit beatricekamau.com/programs)
 
Business Inquiries?
Email the team: hi@beatricekamau.com
IG: @theselflovefix.
Website: www.beatricekamau.com
